modName: Magic Surrounding Weapons And Rings SWAR
summary:
The mod is a patcher that randomize magical items essentialy from mods to proove the magical effects can be everytime everywhere.
Compatible with anything, skyprocpatcher do it very well without ctd on ctd, add rings and daggers systematicaly...
descriptionHtml:
[center]

[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙[/size][/color][/font][font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1][/size][/color]
[b][color=#ff7700] [/color][color=#6aa84f][size=2]NEW UPDATE & NEW UPDATE INCLUDE GUI & OPTIONS[/size][/color][/b]
[color=#ff7700][size=1]˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙
[/size][/color][/font][b]New instructions for usage of smash and later potentially predefined configuration in last steps in install part.
[/b][font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]
[/size][/color][/font][font=Verdana][color=#f9cb9c]THERE IS A NEW BEST MOD EVER FOR ALL YOUR MODS LIKE MINE, IT'S CALLED [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90987]SMASH[/url][color=#f9cb9c]﻿(just spam next button):[/color]
[color=#f9cb9c]This mod help you to merge or avoid mods rewrite each together, so diverify game by 500%, it resolve bugs, conflicts, IT REPLACE ENTIRELY WRYEBASH or BASHED PATCH(tweak option still usefull but untick all the rest)[/color]
[color=#f9cb9c]Attention skyprocpatcher should be processes after SMASH but mine NOT, so patch SWAR before SMASH including it ticked and setting Smash.All.[/color]

[s][color=#f9cb9c]I report development of this mod,i post few pics about types of configurations of the magics present in the world, the panels can be reune in a preset, lists of mods compatibilities are not posted yet, tests with skyrim together soon, asking forum is welcome and free, waiting tests and new merging mods eventually compatibles.[/color][/s]


[color=#fce5cd]You can ask me to join beta testing or development at irc.freenode.org #skyrim-dev-fr or [url=https://discord.gg/HJZB6pt]discord channel[/url]﻿
The program will be released before the summer because i need at least 2 month to finish more important work.[/color]

[color=#f9cb9c][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/5503343-1520199050.png[/img]﻿[/color]
[color=#f9cb9c][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/5503343-1520199316.png[/img]﻿[/color]
[color=#f9cb9c][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/5503343-1520199404.png[/img]﻿[/color]
[color=#f9cb9c][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/5503343-1520199465.png[/img]﻿[/color]
[color=#f9cb9c][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/5503343-1520199525.png[/img]﻿[/color]
[color=#f9cb9c]This last panel is not fully developped, it needs more lists of class and npcs[/color]
[color=#f9cb9c][img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/images/110/5503343-1521059984.png[/img]﻿[/color]

[color=#f9cb9c]Another panel not related and released to others mods should be added:[/color]
[color=#f9cb9c]Its about sliders and same type of filters for npc and classes but for the list of magic effects repartition chances at a stage of the [/color]
[color=#f9cb9c]program after loading you can make changes to the sliders that represent the amount of that type of weapons initially incorporated into [/color]
[color=#f9cb9c]the game if the weapon type match the npc currently used weapons types or accepted, there is a option to equalise theses diversities.[/color]
[s](New V2 USKP Compatible,waiting V3 ?)[/s]
[s]Version 3 will include all vanilla non enchanted items to have strange powers from others mods(selectable).[/s]
[s]After v1(increased chances) without filters, v2 is out with options.[/s]
[/font][/center][center][font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][b]﻿     [/b][color=#6aa84f][b]PRESENTATION[/b](FOR THE VERSION 2)[/color][/font]
[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]………………………………………………………………………[/size][/color][/font]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][color=#ffd966][font=Verdana]Based on differents mods that are visually an enhanced experience in magic environments for skyrim, this mod [/font]
[font=Verdana]tend to show capabilities of magical effects for all npc and distribute all weapons, armors and rings into [/font]
[font=Verdana]their inventory.[/font][/color]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][color=#ffd966][font=Verdana]To not bring real vanilla immersion i do not put systematicaly a magic weapon with visibles enchantments on [/font]
[font=Verdana]every character in the game, it is possible you see guards use a lot of magical items for fighting or not![/font][/color]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][color=#ffd966][font=Verdana]All theses magics items produce their own magic effects directly or indirectly in the environment by another [/font]
[font=Verdana]famous mod, Enchanted Arsenal by egocarib , i give my preset that may works well for basic weapons effects to [/font]
[font=Verdana]be seen on npc.[/font][/color]


[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#6aa84f][b](MY ENB)[/b][/color][/font]
[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]…………………………[/size][/color][/font]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][color=#ffd966][font=Verdana]I use my own enb that was made originaly to keep the most fps in game with a common configuration for the game [/font]
[font=Verdana]and the enb, next i updated to latest enb and discontinued the enb for another new with sweetfx added to enb, [/font]
[font=Verdana]exactly the same without performance lost.[/font][/color]
[font=Verdana][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57031/?]Enb fps lossless[/url]﻿[/font]
[font=Verdana][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/81411?]Enb fps lossless sweet[/url]﻿
[/font][font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]

[b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Others mods[/color][/font]

˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙[/size][/color][/font]
[color=#6aa84f][b] [/b][b][font=Georgia]NEEDED MODS[/font][/b][/color]
[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]……………………………………………[/size][/color][/font]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Enchanted arsenal and dependencies(remove any mods that it already include!)[/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56614]Enchanted Arsenal[/url]﻿[/font]
[color=#ffd966][font=Verdana]Effects affect only unsheated weapons or its linked to the weapons itself for permanent additionnal effects [/font]
[font=Verdana]from other mods generally never overriden.[/font]
[font=Verdana]PS:Using fis to save outfits doesnt recover your latest data, it need manually reconfiguration, so i do [/font]
[font=Verdana]not provide my outifits in the preset, look further for specials effects and test them on npcs.[/font][/color]


[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙[/size][/color][/font]

[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]…………………………………………………………[/size][/color][/font]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][color=#ffd966][font=Verdana]Immersive spells(I recommand not too much lights area from weapon base color like 128 and use yellow for [/font]
[/color][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]default color, after depend of what you gear or have in your hands or locations.)[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39759]Immersive spells[/url]﻿[/color][/font]
[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]

˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙[/size][/color][/font]

[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]………………………………………[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Verdana][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][color=#ffd966]Immersive weapons(my version include only 3 magic item as you can see with patcher)[/color][/font]
[font=Verdana][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][color=#ffd966]SkyMoMod[/color][/font]
[font=Verdana][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][color=#ffd966]Sperg[/color][/font]
[font=Verdana][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][color=#ffd966]Magic mods(apocalypse spells) ...
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][color=#ffd966]Rebirth Monster[/color]
[b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][color=#ffd966]Draco's Enchantment Overhaul Mod With Vendor[/color][/color][/font]
[color=#ffd966][font=Verdana]NB:Some magic weapons add their own magic effects, a fire ball, a fear spell added in weapon hand etc,staffs [/font]
[font=Verdana]seems too impacted but if there is more than one enchantment that should not be visible for all type of [/font]
[font=Verdana]effects, normally its only one color as simple as vanilla.[/font]
[font=Verdana]You can try let add every mods you have, this should not hurt anything dramatically.[/font][/color]
[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]

[/size][/color][/font][font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙[/size][/color][/font]
[b][font=Georgia][color=#6aa84f]OTHERS MODS FOR VISUAL EFFECTS(FOR VERSION 2)[/color][/font][/b]
[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]…………………………………………………………………………………………………………………[/size][/color][/font]
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Kace autoloot add very nice effects for dead bodies, loot status and auto loot.[/color][/font]
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Add at least a ambient light overhaul like ELXF.
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Finding others mods with 300+ enchanted items

[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙[/size][/color][/font]
[b][font=Georgia][color=#6aa84f]OTHERS MODS FOR VERSION 3(CURRENTLY V2)[/color][/font][/b]
[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]…………………………………………………………………………………………………………………[/size][/color][/font][/color][/font]
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b]This mod add rings that add effects in armors [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49699]Enchanted Visual Effects[/url]﻿
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b]This mod add directly new armors enchanted with effects [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21522?tab=description]Enchanted Visual and Magical Effects[/url]﻿
[/color][/font][b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966][size=2]!New enchantments with strange powers will be used in version 3! [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12383]Additionnal item Enchantments[/url]﻿[/size][/color][/font][/center][center]

[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙[/size][/color][/font]
[b][font=Georgia][color=#6aa84f] IMPORTANT INFORMATION[/color][/font][/b]
[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]……………………………………………………………………[/size][/color][/font]
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][color=#ffd966][font=Verdana]The way you order the list of mods before do the patch change how the jar file will distribute every items [/font]
[font=Verdana]concerned, the more you put a mod in the top list the more it have chance, if conditions are favorable, to be [/font]
[font=Verdana]seen more often.[/font][/color]
[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]

˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙˙[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Georgia][color=#6aa84f][b] [/b][b]INSTALLATION[/b][/color][/font]
[font=Arial][color=#ff7700][size=1]………………………………………[/size][/color][/font]
[font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Step 1:[/color][/font]
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Download prerequisites and others mods.[/color][/font]
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][color=#ffd966][font=Verdana]Paste the preset for enchanted arsenal in Skyrim/Data/SKSE/Plugins/FISS/Enchanted Arsenal/Preset 6.xml(or [/font]
[font=Verdana]overwritte Preset 1.xml but its not recommanded).
[/font]
[font=Verdana]Step 2:
[/font][/color][b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Delete any SurroundingWeaponsAndRings.esp or smash or bashed patch or even smash...esp.save(see last step)[/color][/font]
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Look at your list order with loot and further with wrye bash for make a new bashed patch activated[/color][/font]
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Download the jar file and paste it in a new folder tree like Skyrim/Data/SKYPROC/whatyourwant/thefile.jar[/color][/font]
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][color=#ffd966][font=Verdana]Look at your list order and verify which mods your want import list of objects(you can let them all selected [/font]
[font=Verdana]like ingame)[/font][/color]
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Select and launch the jar file after install java jre min 1.7
[/color][/font][b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]HERE YOU CAN CONFIGURE:(black/white list words, Nolist by id, choose options for filter functionnalities)
[/color][/font][b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Do not close the launcher even at 100% it may not be finished.(report if stuck because it should close itself)[/color][/font]
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana][color=#ffd966]Click patch and wait the final message after checks, can take 1 mn or more.[/color][/font]
[b][b][font=Trebuchet MS][color=#980000][size=5]×[/size][/color][/font][/b][/b][font=Verdana](((Be sure the mod is activated and loaded latest, even if you use a basher patch or any other patch, if necessary [/font]
[font=Verdana]make a rules in loot for load this mod after the last for ex bashed patch.(it will works as excepected by if [/font]
[font=Verdana]any other problem you can load it before, that will just decrease a bit chances).[/font]
[font=Verdana]Enjoy!)))
[/font][color=#980000][size=5][b]×[/b][/size][/color][font=Verdana]There is a new step that enhance greatly this mod and all yours mods installed and used, SMASH resolves all types of records that are conflicts between mods that rewrite each together but not with this, its a total replacement for bashed patch or even wrye bash(excepted tweak part in the bashed patch and some other few utilities), it is necessary to use it so please patch SWAR before SMASH (normally skyprocpatchers should be processes after but NOT mine) so finals steps are:
[/font][color=#ffd966]---Patch swar normaly as usual with presets or settings or nothing[/color]
[color=#ffd966]---Reopen Wrye Bash to make selected and position my mod last just after bashed patch[/color]
[color=#e69138]---Extract smash into a new folder, dont reuse the same install if final filesize is not correct or lowered.
---Launch smash program(extract anywhere) and tick to choose my mod(bashed patch should not be ticked except for tweaks so Smash.All)
---Normally Swar should be set to Smash.All or .skip but anyway click the green right arrow, the very left button.
---After few minutes, it should generate a new esp smash, please verify it is not under .esp.save and after program closed, rename it if necessary to same name.esp[/color]
[color=#ffd966]-Reopen wrye bash to tick and change order, put smash in very last position ![/color]
[color=#ffd966]-Done[/color]
